page.title: 11COUNT OF POPULATION
page.content: There are 23 people living in{Trull}of whom 3 are old age pensioners and 4 are school aged children. There are no infants under 5 yrs. A{count}was made of the{population in a total of 50 {houses}scattered between Rodmarton, Culkerton and the edge of Ashley, all within our block. There were 152 people. These were 31 school aged children, 9 infants under five yrs. 29 pensioners and 83 others. In 17 houses there were people with{relations}in other houses in the same village.The average number of relations was 6 with 16 the highest number. In 11 houses people had always lived in the same village. In 20 houses people worked in the village where they lived.
